review_text:
Beautiful wooded area, felt private. We loved the walk to the lake!
We will try to stay again!
Cecilia‚Äôs adorable condo was perfect! Tucked away, but so close to the town and everything you would need. Very clean and pleasant!
AMAZING house, perfectly clean and up to date, my guys loved staying here!

Perfection. We could not have been happier with this beautiful condo. We were taking our first child to college nearby and this was the perfect retreat for some final moments together. The setting is absolutely beautiful and the home provided the perfect space for our family. The kids liked it even more than our own house!! Cecilia was beyond helpful and responsive, the home was absolutely spotless, and everything was exactly as pictured, if not better. We will be back as often as we can!
Place is awesome! Cecilia very responsive and excellent host. Look forward to staying in the future.
Beautiful clean home with beautiful scenery. Loved waking up drinking our coffee on screened in patio to birds and wildlife in back yard
Repeat stayers while in town for work. Everything is fantastic as usual! Loved the rainfall shower head so much, my husband replaced our two with them!!
As always, it has been fantastic! We are staying here again throughout the year for work. Love it!

We traveled from Mississippi and chose this as a gathering place to visit with nearby family. It worked well as we were able to cook when we wanted to and it was comfortable for sleeping when family was able to stay the night. Nearby lake is a bonus via hiking trail. Beautiful, well equipped kitchen and screened in porch that looks out into peaceful woods. Washer/dryer was a bonus. Quiet duplex community. TV in living room. 2 very nice, fully equipped bathrooms(shampoo, conditioner, body wash) Bring your hair dryer if you need one. Ceiling fans in every room. 2 car garage. Communication with Cecelia was easy. We would stay again.
Great place!! Will definitely stay there again. Everything was fantastic!!
The home was absolutely gorgeous very clean host was very helpful and caring 10/10 would recommend if you are in the Hillsdale area
Place was beautiful!

Beautiful, new, fully stocked home in a lovely, peaceful neighborhood. The screened in patio was one of our very favorite things. Top notch communication and friendly, flexible hosts made it a great stay. Absolutely recommend this home for a great experience all around!

Cecelia was wonderful and her place was fabulous! I booked it for several colleagues who were in town. The place has great wifi and work spaces-desks in the bedrooms and the dining table were perfect.
I highly recommend her place for work or pleasure

We LOVED this home! New home, spacious, well appointed. It was beautiful inside and out, near town but hidden away in a quiet development. Screened in back deck was amazing. We were attending a COM conference from North Carolina at the fairgrounds, yet saw deer, squirrels, raccoons, and a ton of birds. Tea, coffee, and water awaited our arrival. We stayed a week, even walked to town one day. We have had several Airbnb stays, and few 5‚Äôs but this is one. Confidently recommend.

What a wonderful place to stay! Cecilia's place is squeaky clean and such a peaceful setting. Not only is Cecilia responsive, but exceptionally helpful with all of our questions about the stay and the area. We HIGHLY recommend staying here if you value cleanliness, privacy, and comfort. Thank you for such a wonderful stay!
We are a family of 8 adults. We have had two children attend Hillsdale College. It is an easy drive and a very lovely place. Wish we would have found it years ago! Well worth it!

Wow. A beautiful home, excellently equipped. I stay in a log of Airbnbs, and I don't believe I have ever seen a kitchen this well equipped.
The historic (1900 or so?) home is in excellent condition, recently renovated in many details. It was perfect for our family gathering including married children and grandchildren.
An 8 minute drive to Hillsdale college.
We enjoyed our stay very much. The house was very beautiful and very comfortable. We will definitely use Phoebe again.

This is a great place and they so have everything you need and have thought of the little things that made it feel like home. They supply little things that are big things like water in every room coffee cream some snacks and other things. We loved it and stayed because of a funeral and the house and what was in it made it all better.

We selfishly want to keep this gem in Jonesville a secret! Phoebe went above and beyond to accommodate us while visiting for a family funeral. The house is pristine and loved the old house feel. The house is beautifully decorated and the beds are very comfortable. Phoebe has thought about and provided everything you might need. The only minor issue is the first bathroom is right off the kitchen and not close to upstairs bath. But the 2nd bath is upstairs by the 4 bedrooms. The kitchen is beautiful and has everything you might need, including coffee pods, spices, oil and vinegar, etc. The house is only a little over a block from downtown Jonesville and close to the bakery, restaurants and park. We thoroughly enjoyed our 4 nights and look forward to coming back!

we had a great time staying with Phoebe. The house was exactly like the photos very charming. Took a tour at the Grovonor Home, which is just up the road from this location. Would definitely stay here again
So beautiful and relaxing. Phoebe has thought of everything you might of forgotten and has any incidentals you might need. FABULOUS house and hostess!

This home was very charming and unique. It was just as described. We felt like we were in a high-end hotel with the quality bedding and amenities. The kitchen was well equipped. There was plenty of room for our group to be together and apart when needed. We would recommend this place to anyone looking to stay in the area. It is walking distance to the charming downtown area.
Phoebe was proactive reaching out, welcoming us with snacks and a personal note. We give 5 stars in all of the components of this space!!
Our stay at the Wetmore House was a wonderful experience! Very clean, and well stocked and not to mention, gorgeous!! We would definitely stay there again! 10/10 recommend!

We enjoyed our stay. The home is beautiful and thoughtfully decorated and amenities included. Very clean home overall. Downtown area and playground in walking distance. Phoebe was very easy to communicate and plan with.
We look forward to staying again the next time we come down!

This is a beautiful and comfortable place to stay in the small, historic town of Jonesville. Lots of thoughtful amenities provided by our hosts! Well stocked, comfy beds, spacious and elegant, with all the modern conveniences. We enjoyed walking the safe, quiet neighborhood with interesting old homes and buildings. Very short commute to Hillsdale College and a lovely, easy drive to Ann Arbor. (Fellow coffee snobs, Rough Draft by HC campus has you covered, less than 10 min away, we stopped there repeatedly.) We were very impressed to wake up after a good snow fall to find an excellent young man clearing the driveway and sidewalks first thing in the morning! Perfect house, neighborhood, and hosts; highly recommend, and we felt it was a great value.

It was nothing short of a privilege to stay at the Wetmore house. Located walking distance from downtown,
this place was such a delight. The care and time that was put to restore this historic home is so evident. From the exquisitely chosen furniture to the hand painted art on the wall, this home was restored with such love. Every need you could possibly have is already anticipated ‚Äî kitchen stocked with coffee, teas, and creamers; a welcome wine and snack basket; the washer complete with stain removers and sprays; bathrooms with extra toiletries; baby crib and accessories; and a large box of box of board games. The home easily and comfortably fits 8, complete with the most comfortable beds. The neighborhood is quaint and quiet and the backyard offers a great setup for evenings on the patio, should you visit in the summer. Phoebe was prompt to respond to every request and went above and beyond to make our stay absolutely wonderful. I could not recommend the Wetmore house more.

We absolutely loved our stay. It was the perfect house to accommodate everyone and the area was so peaceful. The house is beautiful and perfectly furnished with everything to make you feel at home. A true hidden treasure in Jonesville!

Phoebe's place is big! And lovely. Lots of old-time charm coupled with modern convenience. Equipped with a large dining-room table; quality appliances; plenty of kitchen counter space, cabinet shelving, cooking gear & utensils. The four large upstairs bedrooms each have a luggage rack, hangers, dresser drawers, extra linens, and a mirror. Mattresses and pillows are very comfortable. Tub shower upstairs; stall shower downstairs. Good water pressure. Ten minute drive to Hillsdale College campus. Parking is secure. Owner is friendly and responsive. She solved a problem we had very quickly. Overall, a wonderful stay and would come again!

Phoebe's house was great, the entire place was just as described. They left a wine bottle, and snacks on the table, as well as water's in the bedrooms. This host took things to the next level. Thank you so much Phoebe. We will definitely remembers our stay with you for the future.
Good place to stay. Walking distance to town. Would recommend if 4 bedrooms is needed

Firefly was a great location for a long weekend family getaway. Everything you could possibly think of was provided by the host for our use. The kids enjoyed the kayaks and paddle boards, spending several hours exploring the area. We had fires at night to cook smores and then relaxed in the enclosed porch. The surrounding homes were close, but it was quiet and the one neighbor we met was very friendly. I have no complaints and would stay there again. This is probably one of my top stays due to all of the amenities provided.
Firefly Cottage was cute and cozy! Our family had a wonderful stay for senior weekend with Hillsdale Baseball. Thank you Scott and Beth! We will be back üòä

We loved everything about Firefly Cottage! Great location right by the lake, well-stocked with all the comforts of home, plenty of games to keep the family entertained, plenty of room, just a perfect place to stay with our children while we visited our oldest at the college.

This was a wonderful place to spend Spring Parents Weekend to visit our son. The view from the living room over the lake was peaceful and refreshing. The neighborhood was very private and felt safe. The home was supplied with so many thoughtful items that made our stay a breeze. Check in and check out were easy, and the commute over to the College and to everything we needed in town was a snap. Scott was a kind and proactive host, and he made sure we had everything we needed before we even thought to ask. We hope to stay again in the future!
A perfect place to recharge and regroup. The cabin looked just like the photos. It was very clean and cozy. No matter the season, you won‚Äôt be disappointed staying here!

Wonderful Hillsdale location directly on Baw Beese. Kayaking and fire pit were excellent family time. Second time we stayed. Owner added a second bath (1/2 bath) that really helps for families or groups. we will be back again.
Place was really nice. Liked sitting by the lake!

We loved our stay at Firefly Cottage! Scott was very responsive and helpful. The cottage had everything we needed for a comfortable and peaceful stay- plenty of cookware, dishes, games, blankets and towels. We had a lovely time!
We enjoyed introducing our grandchildren to Kayaking!

Scott was an exceptional host - very proactive and genuinely caring about our family's stay. This is a super cute spot with a great backyard and plenty of things for people of all ages to do. Highly recommend!

The Firefly Cottage was a perfect place for family memories to be made. The house is light and open with lots of comfortable gathering spots. The lake view and yard is welcoming with the trail only steps away from the house. Its a great place to gather with those you hold dear.

We‚Äôre so thankful for the foresight of the owner‚Äôs installing a generator. There was a winter store, and the electricity went off in the area, however we were very well cared for without any interruptions to electricity.

Well furnished and equipped house for a quiet stay close to Hillsdale. Neighbors were great and the lakefront was amazing. The house came with lots of indoor and outdoor entertainment and a well stocked kitchen. We look forward to staying there again!!!
Fun family friendly home with beautiful lake views. Quiet and relaxing. Very well equipped. We had a great time

Our stay at Firefly Cottage was fantastic. The cottage is comfy and cozy. Every comfort of home, superb attention to detail. Clean and spacious. Fluffy towels, soft blankets, a kitchen filled with everything you need. Great selection of games, ping pong (adults loved this just as much as the kids!)
The lakefront is beautiful. So much fun with the kayaks exploring the lake, floating on inflatables, watching the swans and cranes. S‚Äômores by the fire, watching the sunsets. The community was very friendly; great for walks and scooter/bike rides. (To the little store for popsicles)
Scott was an excellent host. Checked in with us to make sure all was well. Very responsive.
I could go on and on‚Ä¶.just book it! You‚Äôll be so glad you did.

Our family had a great time! The lake was great for swimming, floating, fishing & boating. The house was small but it was set up very well and we didn‚Äôt feel crowded at all. The kitchen was stocked with almost everything we needed, besides food, which was so helpful. Also the laundry room was a huge plus. Great place to relax & we would love to stay again!

The pictures don't do the place justice. The backyard was wonderful and really huge. We saw deer, lots of birds, some sandhill cranes and fishing jumping in the lake. It was so quiet (except for the wildlife noises) and private. The indoors were way bigger than they looked or were described and had lots of interesting architecture. Laura and Eric were SUPER helpful and very responsive. There is a nice little trail that leads right on to campus if you are there for an event. Great place.
Nice home on a quiet street. Lovely accommodations. All bedrooms are upstairs. Mobility challenged will have difficulty navigating steep stairs. Hosts were awesome and so very helpful.
Very convenient for Hillsdale College visit.
Spacious and spotless. Super easy check-in. Would stay again.

Great little house! Perfect place to stay to attend anything at Hillsdale University. We were there for track and field.
Very clean, comfy, and central location!
Great hosts! Would definitely stay again!
Wonderful stay! Very clean and well appointed!

What a lovely home! We were in Hillsdale for a college visit and this place was perfect‚Ä¶walkable to campus and ideal for two moms and their daughters. It was very clean and well appointed with sweet decor that looked ready for a photo shoot. Elizabeth was very prompt with replies and super easy to work with. A ‚Äúmust stay‚Äù if you‚Äôre visiting Hillsdale!
Darling home near Hillsdale campus. Beautifully decorated with thoughtful design.
Great place to stay for a family visit to Hillsdale. Thank you for making it so easy and convenient! And for the friendly hospitality!
Elizabeth‚Äôs home is a beautifully clean conveniently located home perfect for anyone‚Äôs visit to Hillsdale. It spaciously accommodates our family of 6!

One of the best AirBnB experiences I‚Äôve ever had! Not only was the property exactly as the photos and descriptions listed, but the hosts had thought of every detail necessary, down to plastic baggies or spare hangers. It‚Äôs conveniently located between downtown Hillsdale and Hillsdale College, and on a quiet street. Plenty of parking! Wonderful home in Hillsdale neighborhood. The house is very clean and comfortable. The hosts insured that our stay was great and went above and beyond helping us with anything we needed. The neighborhood is nice and quiet and walkable to many restaurants. If I am back in Hillsdale area, this will be my go to rental.

This was the perfect place to stay to attend an event at Hillsdale College. We walked back and forth to campus and also into town‚Äîit‚Äôs right in between. The house feels spacious in the downstairs rooms, and the bedrooms upstairs were comfortable. We were very thankful to stay there!
Super comfortable and well appointed house close to downtown and campus! Excellent place for hosting a Hillsdale trip!
Clean, good location, reasonably spacious, and good communication from owners.

A GEM!! Located close to the college, grocery store and the best coffee in Hillsdale! The large spacious living areas were perfect for our family Christmas celebration. The house was clean, easily located and in a safe and quiet neighborhood. As someone who travels to Hillsdale often for college events, this will now be our go-to rental. Thank you!

We can't recommend this place enough! The home was spotless from floor to ceiling, spacious, and looked exactly like the pictures. The hosts have thought of everything; many thoughtful touches made our stay particularly nice, like filtered water, coffee from a nearby roaster, board games, and strong wifi. The neighborhood was very quiet and perfectly located between downtown and the college. Howder House will be our first choice any time we are in Hillsdale.

Such a cozy and inviting home away from home! We so enjoyed our stay in this pristinely-appointed home and hope to return. The beds were comfortable, with premium linens. So many wonderful touches (cozy couch blankets, Brita pitcher, coffee). There were multiple spaces ideal for working or reading. Parking is easy, as driveway is parallel to entry. Easy 10 minute walk to campus; I walked back late one evening and felt safe. We will stay again!

I am hesitant to write this review, because I don‚Äôt want anyone else to know how great this charming house is, ha! The beds are all comfortable with good lighting and closet space, and this is a perfect location for visiting the college. Walkable in five minutes. Hosts are wonderful. I‚Äôm so grateful we found it! Five stars!

Perfect location to visit our son at Hillsdale College. House was pleasant and very clean. Can't say enough about the beds...SO comfortable...wanted to bring them homeüòÑ Sandra was a wonderful host. She's very mindful of all those little touches that make you feel welcome and comfortable.

Great location with quick access to the city of Hillsdale. Sandra is a really great host who responds quickly to any question or comment.
I travel to Hillsdale a few times a year and always stay here!
The is a great place to stay while visiting Hillsdale college students. Very clean and close to campus.
The apartment had all that we needed and was well-cared for! It was very convenient to family who live near the college and was exactly as described and pictured! Thank you for the stay!
Loved this place near his parents. will probably stay again.
Wonderful cozy place to stay. We had such a great time spending time with family, felt like a home away from home.
Sandra's place is great and exactly as advertised. It's a quick 2 min drive into downtown Hillsdale. I stay here whenever I visit and would recommend to it anyone.

Sandra‚Äôs place was better than as described. Her place was spotless clean and kitchen was well stocked. The beds were very comfortable and the place was pretty quiet considering on a main road. Definitely will book again.

Great clean space located minutes from
Hillsdale! Easy check in and the on site laundry was a plus. Sandra was responsive and accommodating

Our stay was seamless, easy, and comfortable at Sandra‚Äôs place. It was clean, well supplied for all of our needs. We were able to use the kitchen. We could easily walk to Overflowing Cups and Cones ‚Äî think drive through/walk-up diner. Easy drive to the college. Quiet location. I would be happy to stay here again.
We had a comfortable and homey experience. Very clean! We would stay here again if something brought us to the area.
Very comfortable and homey. Easy to get to everything. Host was very responsive. I would recommend it.
We were in Hillsdale for a wedding. I needed a place close to the wedding location and something that could accommodate my elderly mom. This place fulfilled both those requirements.
Very cute house in a great area. Easy to get to and a very easy check in and out. Highly recommend.
Good place to stay out of town for work

Sandra was a wonderful host. She was very responsive. Her place was just as described. Everything was nice and clean and well stocked. The beds were extremely comfortable. We would definitely stay in Sandra's place again.

We came for a 4 night stay and it was the perfect place. It had everything we needed. The town was also super cute with lots to do. The park nearby was so fun for our daughter. We would absolutely stay there again!

Sandra‚Äôs place was the perfect spot for our week in Michigan for a family wedding.
Check in was a breeze.
The kitchen had everything. Well stocked supplies.
Sandra was available for an immediate need (no fault of hers or the place‚Äîall my own doing) and she responded with kindness and the exact fix we needed!
Comfy bed, plenty of extra bath towels and huge laundry room.
Location was perfect as well. We absolutely loved it.
Great place to stay. Would come back again

Sandra‚Äôs place was quiet, clean, and had all the accommodations needed for a great stay. The beds were very comfortable and we got a great sleep each night.
We especially loved the coffee pods and accompaniments, as well as plenty of bottled water provided for making a great cup of Java.
We highly recommend this lovely and wonderful place at Hillsdale, Michigan.
This is a nice place to stay near downtown Hillsdale. The owners are responsive and pay attention to details.

The house was cozy and comfortable. Location was safe and well lit and had ample parking. Access to town was easy and fast and getting around wasn‚Äôt an issue. We will definitely keep this in mind for our returns to Hillsdale for future events!
Beautiful home!
Great, clean place to stay with all of the amenities.

We were in Hillsdale for a graduation and this house was perfect for our visit. Had everything that we needed. Very clean and well appointed. Sandra was very responsive to my messages. We would stay here again.
The location is ideal, just a few minutes drive outside of downtown Hillsdale. And Sandra is quick and responsive with communication. Highly recommended.
Very comfortable home. Great location if visiting Hillsdale college.

Little details were nice including toiletries, high quality window coverings, and bottled water. I very much appreciated the off street parking. Host responded quickly and thoroughly to all questions. Bed was super comfortable.
Sandra was very quick to respond. The house was very clean and comfortable. We liked that it was close to the college and had room for us to have home cooked meals with our college student.
Cute place with comfy beds, a nice kitchen. Second time staying here and it is a nice place.
Had a few issues but Sandra was very responsive and quick to get them taken care of. We would definitely book again!
Great stay out visiting Hillsdale College with Sandra and her husband. Thank you both for a good experience.

Great place to stay!! Clean!
Convenient and everything was super wonderful! We would absolutely stay here again!

We had a great stay at the Comfy House! The home was very clean, had everything we needed for our stay and more. Sandra was very communicative and I‚Äôm sure would have responded promptly if we had any issues, which we did not. The location is very convenient to campus and Johnny T‚Äôs, a restaurant we like in Hillsdale. The linens and towels are all white, which I appreciate. We have nothing but good things to stay about this airbnb. The place was clean and the location was convenient to Hillsdale College. Sandra was very gracious and accommodating. She responded to any messages or questions instantly. They thought of a lot of things that made our stay more enjoyable; like good coffee, and half and half in the fridge for cream, a big bottle of water, and even a stick of butter in the fridge, which came in handy, because we made breakfast each morning at the airbnb, and we like toast with butter. I would definitely stay there again.
Very clean and tidy. Had laundry. Very small bathroom, so wouldn't be great for a crowd, but was perfect for my wife and I. We each got our own bedroom!
Great place, comfortable beds. Clean and lots of amenities. Would definitely stay again if back in the area sometime.
This is a charming and comfortable place to stay! The location is super convenient! If you need a place to stay in Hillsdale, this is a great choice!
Great! Was very close to Hillsdale College and very comfortable for 4 people!
Clean and quiet home with easy access to the college and shooting range! Everything we needed and more!
We enjoyed staying at this clean and cozy place while in Hillsdale.
Nice, quiet place exactly as advertised. Would stay again if coming back to the area.
An amazing stay!
super clean and accurate. easy stay for quick trip to Hillsdale
Great location and clean!
We enjoyed our stay here. It had everything we needed. Clean and comfortable. Great location. We stayed here while hiking the North Country Trail. Less than a mile off the trail.
Great communication, property as described and great proximity to everything Hillsdale has to offer!
Sandra's place was exactly as advertised. Highly recommended.
Perfect for visitors making a trip to Hillsdale for whatever reason that might be.
Clean house with comfortable beds that met our needs. A bit tight for family of 4 (two being teens). Host was kind enough to supply a cot.

The cozy house was exactly that. We had ample room for what we needed. The bedrooms were very cozy and the beds, linens, pillows, etc. very comfortable. Overall, the house was clean and well situated with what we needed. Laundry room was nice to have and outdoor patio. The host is very responsive although I didn't bother them during my 5 days there. There's a couple things that could be done better but it didn't affect my stay very much and everything was in good working order. I would consider staying here again when in town.

Excellent place to stay for a long weekend in Hillsdale. The house was immaculate and cozy. The beds were very comfortable. It was nice to make some good meals! Close to the college and downtown. We will definitely stay again.

Stephen and Sandra are the best host/hostess. They responded quickly to my questions and even came over when I had an issue. The home is a 5+ rating. Great place, well stocked, great communication
Second time staying here and it was great! Perfect location for visiting our family around the area. Thanks so much!
clean and cute! instructions were thorough and helpful, and we had a great time!
This was our second stay at Steven and Sandra's, everything was just as it was before, clean and cozy. Hosts are quick to communicate, excellent stay all around!

Best kept secret in Hillsdale! A comfortable and convenient hideaway in downtown Hillsdale minutes away from the college. This quaint, 2 bedroom apartment offered a quiet retreat after a long day‚Äôs journey. Clean rooms, and low key instructions with special extras like water, coffee and kitchen amenities available as needed. Woke up to shoveled walks after an overnight snowstorm, enjoyed easy cable and Wi-Fi accessibility and details like laundry sheets in each drawer to provide freshness! Wonderful place! We enjoyed our stay and was very happy. The host are awesome!

We stayed over a weekend for a family wedding. This was a great location- close to the college and surrounding area. Plenty of clean towels and toilet paper. üòä
The house was clean and big enough for our family of four to spread out when we were there.
Providing tea, coffee, sugar and Splenda was an extra nice touch.
So clean and comfortable. The perfect place for us to stay while touring Hillsdale College. I love the layout of the home. Everything was perfect. 5 Stars.
Second stay at this property was again excellent. Clean, nicely equipped and conveniently located. Will stay here again!
Cute place to stay while visiting our daughter at Hillsdale College. Only a 5 min drive to campus, and convenient to downtown for dining, etc. The bedding was A+ quality! Great hosts! Thank you!
Great location! Clean and everything is just as it says on the site..

Great location, very close to campus. The house was clean and comfortably furnished. The kitchen and living room were large enough to accommodate 4 adults comfortably. The kitchen was well equipped. We would definitely stay there again.
Great place to stay at! Very clean, and just the right size!
Great little house! Very clean and great location.
Excellent hosts that go above and beyond! The house is great for a small family and the location is perfectly situated on the edge of town!

This place exceeded our expectations. Very private, clean, and just right for two people. What impressed me was the attention to detail: A full length mirror, luggage rack, plenty of hangars in each room, and lots of pillows! Would definitely recommend, and would definitely stay here if we return to the area.

This is a great apartment. The location in Hillsdale is wonderful, just a few minutes from downtown and the college, and walking distance to Baw Beese Lake. The apartment is clean, and I really appreciate how the hosts tell you not to worry about towels and sheets, etc. Check-in was really easy, and when we had a problem after we left (thought we forgot a bag), they let us back into the apartment to look. I‚Äôm sure we‚Äôll stay again!!
Great place to stay!!
It was a great place to stay. The size was comfortable and the hosts were great. I would definitely recommend this place and will stay there again in the future if the opportunity arises.
This house is in a fantastic location right next to the fair grounds, and very close to downtown. Steve and Sandra were great hosts.
Great place to stay when visiting Hillsdale!
Great place to stay. Cozy and convenient. We'll definitely stay there again the next time we're in the area visiting family!

Stayed here for a week while working in Hillsdale. The location was great (close to grocery store and close to work). The hosts were very accommodating with check in. House was very clean and plenty of clean towels and linens. Plus having a washer and dryer to clean clothes and a dishwasher was amazing and such a convenience. Would have booked again but they‚Äôre already getting booked up for season (rightfully so!)
Comfortable with access to household amenities. We enjoyed our stay.
Would highly recommend Steven and Sandra's place. Very clean, nicely decorated, "home from home" kind of feel. It's a little out of the center of Hillsdale, but just a 5min drive to the college.
We had a lovely stay here. There place is very cozy & close to downtown. Perfect for our short stay & would be excellent for a long stay as well!
We had a great stay!

This is a great house! Peaceful and quiet. Very comfortable beds. Kitchen is well stocked with all sorts of essentials. Thoughtful welcoming letter. I thoroughly enjoyed staying at Steven and Sandra‚Äôs. They were easy to reach and provided very pleasant stay.
Conveniently located near Hillsdale College. Quiet and clean quaint cottage-like home.
Steven and Sandra's place was a comfortable place to stay while we visited Hillsdale College
Very conveniently located little cottage on the main road into Hillsdale. Private, quiet, and comfortable with great amenities.
Our stay was excellent, we felt right at home. Will definitely be back next time we visit Hillsdale!

This place was very clean, comfortable, no hassle check in and out, and quick responses from hosts. The place had everything we needed and things we didn‚Äôt realize we needed. We really enjoyed our stay.
A quaint, comfortable and quiet cottage with good amenities close to Hillsdale College and the Baw Beese lake attractions.

This AirBNB is connected to an office, but it might as well not be. Great privacy, only see a few people walk by a day. The hosts were great about privacy and the place was very clean! I enjoyed me stay!
Great hosts. Wonderful accommodations. Couldn‚Äôt be more convenient. We will definitely be back.

Stayed here for a 2 week work trip and it was a great place to come back at the end of the day. The water is a bit metalic so I used bottled water for drinking which they supply initially as well. Otherwise no issues and was a great stay. Close to everything in Hillsdale
A quiet, roomy, comfortable and private cottage very close to downtown Hillsdale and the Baw Beese lake attractions. Easy to find.
Great place!

If you're looking for a home away from home, this place is for you! Very clean, really well-equipped [new condiments in fridge, Keurig pods, wonderful towels]! We stayed for a long weekend and felt very comfortable at Steven and Sandra's - highly recommend it!

Wonderful space to stay both bedrooms were absolutely gorgeous having a ready-made coffee and washer and dryer in the house made things very nice and very clean I know my way around Hillsdale pretty much and it was just a wonderful place to stay
Great place to stay in Hillsdale! We stay here often when we visit. It's always immaculately clean!
Good price with very nice accommodations.
Great place to stay, very clean and perfect for a short getaway.
A clean, comfortable space with everything that I needed for the week.
